comment._content: At a guess, 1932, as the north approach is still being landscaped, or seems fairly untouched. But I guess it could be later in the 1930s.

comment.author: 28304000@N00
comment._content: Luna Park opened in October 1935 - so has to be 1935+

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/albert3801] Thanks, I just read in Wikipedia that it opened 4 October 1935 so we have a start date. AB

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: The pool looks finished and it should be possible to determine when it opened.

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: You need that guy with the shadow computer,   I think the photo is taken in winter quite late in the afternoon from the length and direction of the shadows.    There seems to be hardly any people around anywhere,   and no cars driving along the road.

comment.author: 23682239@N07
comment._content: North Sydney Olympic Pool opened in April 1936.
